input.sentences: the bride and groom walked down the aisle together .
they sang karaoke to each other .
the groom and his brother posed for the camera .
the guest enjoyed their time laughing together .
output.sentences: The bride and groom walked out after the ceremony.
She sang awful karaoke, but it was fun!
The groom posed with his best man for the camera.
The guest had the greatest time laughing all night.
The groomsmen posed for the photo but forgot to tell the groom their picture was being taken.
